commits: e9328eb: feat(#11): add withLogging() API logger and apply to log routes (Phase 2)

tasks_completed.notes: All 10 test cases pass: dev env logging, production bypass, test bypass, debug level, truncation, skipResponseBody, unchanged response, error propagation, generic type inference, params non-access

tasks_completed.description: Apply withLogging() to log API routes
tasks_completed.notes: GET handlers wrapped with withLogging. Filename route uses skipResponseBody:true. No DELETE handler exists in current codebase, so only GET handlers were wrapped. Handler logic unchanged - only wrapped with withLogging and params resolved via Promise.resolve().

quality_gates.unit_tests: 3015 passed, 7 skipped (10 new tests for api-logger)

message: Phase 2 TDD implementation complete. withLogging() HOF created with 10 unit tests (100% branch coverage). Applied to logs/route.ts (GET) and logs/[filename]/route.ts (GET with skipResponseBody). All quality gates passed.
